title: Across Canada with Princess Elizabeth
brief_description: A memorable record of the 15,000 mile tour of Canada by Princess Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh. Opening with the Royal couple’s tumultuous reception in Quebec, the film covers the full extent of the tour. Narrated by Bernard Braden and Barbera Kelly.
